SA07n2986:2: ) (1) kāyāvāgmānasaṁ karma kṛtaṁ yac ca śubhāśubham |
SA07n2986:3: lokas tasya phalaṁ bhuṅkte kartā nānyo 'sti kasya cit ||
SA07n2986:5: uktavantas tathā tad dhi karmaṇo yasya yat phalam ||
SA07n2986:6: (3) tad vakṣāmi samāsena śrotuṁ yuktaṁ bhavārthibhiḥ |
SA07n2986:9: saṁvadhyānyāṁś ca hiṁsanti saṁjīvaṁ yānti te dhruvam ||
SA07n2986:11: saṁjīvanti yatas tatra tena saṁjīva ucyate ||
SA07n2986:15: jvaladbhiḥ krakacais tatra kālasūtras tataḥ smṛtaḥ ||
SA07n2986:16: (8) dāvādau dahanair dāhaṁ dehināṁ vidadhāti yaḥ |
SA07n2986:17: sa tīvrair jvalanair jantus tapyate tapane raṭan ||
SA07n2986:21: saṁtāpayati cānyāṁś ca tapyate sa pratāpane ||
SA07n2986:24: (11) ajaiḍakaśṛgālāṁś ca śaśākhumṛgasūkarān anyāṁś ca prāṇino ghnanti saṁghātaṁ yānti te narāḥ ||
SA07n2986:25: (12) saṁhatās tatra ghātyante samyag vā hananaṁ yataḥ |
SA07n2986:28: kaṭukāpaṭikā ye ca rauravaṁ yānti te narāḥ ||
SA07n2986:30: raudraṁ ravaṁ vimuñcanti yatas tasmāt sa rauravaḥ ||
SA07n2986:31: (14) devadvijaguror dravyaṁ hṛtaṁ yair duḥkhinām iha |
SA07n2986:34: rauravo hi mahāṁs tasya mahattvarauravād api ||
SA07n2986:35: (16) kṛtvā guṇādhike tīvram apakāraṁ nihatya ca |
SA07n2986:37: (17) asthīny api viśīryante raudrāgnau tatra dehinām |
SA07n2986:38: yato na vīciḥ saukhyasya tenāvīcir udāhṛtaḥ ||
SA07n2986:40: pāpād asinakhās te tu jāyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ ||
SA07n2986:41: (19) nakhā evāsayas teṣām āyasā jvalitāḥ kharāḥ |
SA07n2986:42: tair anyonyaṁ nikṛntanti yat tenāsinakhāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
SA07n2986:53: (23) krūraiḥ śvabhir ayodaṁṣṭraiḥ khādyante vivaśā bhṛśam |
SA07n2986:56: yāti vaitaraṇīṁ śaśvad vahninā dahyate naraḥ ||
SA07n2986:59: (26) pīḍā bahubhir ākāraiḥ kṛtā yair dehinām iha |
SA07n2986:62: kṣuradhārācitaṁ mārgaṁ gatvā krāmanti te narāḥ ||
SA07n2986:64: bhūyo bhūyo mahākāyāḥ krandantas te śaracchatam ||
SA07n2986:65: (28) vrataṁ yas tu samāśritya samyag no parirakṣati |
SA07n2986:67: (29) aṇunāpi hi yaḥ kaścin mithyājīvena jīvati |
SA07n2986:68: bhakṣyate kṛmibhiś caṇḍaiḥ sa magno gūthamṛttike ||
SA07n2986:70: āyasair muṣalais taptaiḥ kṣobhyante te punaḥ punaḥ ||
SA07n2986:74: kāyavāgmānasaṁ pāpaṁ yat tad aṇv api varjayet ||
SA07n2986:81: jāyante mukharā dhṛṣṭāś capalātmāś ca vāyasāḥ ||
SA07n2986:85: jāyante pretya māṁsādāḥ krodhanā matsarā narāḥ ||
SA07n2986:87: bhavanti tyāgino darpāt krodhāc ca garuḍeśvarāḥ ||
SA07n2986:88: (39) kṛtaṁ yat pāpakaṁ karma svayaṁ vākkāyamānasam |
SA07n2986:89: triyañcas tena jāyante tan manāg api mā kṛthāḥ ||
SA07n2986:93: (41) viheṭhayanti ye bālān vañcayanty api tṛṣṇayā |
SA07n2986:96: jāyante ye narāḥ pretya pretās te galagaṇḍakāḥ ||
SA07n2986:97: (42) dānaṁ nivārayaty eva na ca kiṁcid dadāti yaḥ |
SA07n2986:99: (43) dhanaṁ rakṣati vaṁśārthaṁ na bhuṅkte na dadāti yaḥ |
SA07n2986:100: dattādāyī tataḥ pretaḥ śrāddhabhoktā sa jāyate ||
SA07n2986:102: bhoktā viṭśleṣmavāntānāṁ pretya pretaḥ sa jāyate ||
SA07n2986:103: (45) apriyaṁ vakti yaḥ krodhād vākyaṁ marmāvaghaṭṭanam |
SA07n2986:104: bhavaty ulkāmukhaḥ pretaḥ suciraṁ tena karmaṇā ||
SA07n2986:105: (46) kurute kalahaṁ yas tu niṣkṛpaḥ krūramānasaḥ |
SA07n2986:107: (47) grāmakūṭo dadāty eva yo dānaṁ pīḍayaty api |
SA07n2986:109: (48) nirdayāḥ prāṇino ghnanti bhakṣyārthaṁ ye dadaty api |
SA07n2986:113: (50) krodhanaḥ piśunaḥ kaś cid arthārthaṁ yaḥ prayacchati |
SA07n2986:116: saṁpradānaratā nityaṁ bhūtāḥ pretya bhavanti te ||
SA07n2986:117: krūrāḥ kruddhāḥ pradātāraḥ priyāsavasurāś ca ye |
SA07n2986:118: jāyante pretya yakṣās te krūrātmānah surāpriyāḥ ||
SA07n2986:122: yakṣādayaḥ śubhaiḥ kliṣṭair atas tān parivarjayet ||
SA07n2986:128: (56) yo hi hartā parasvānāṁ na ca kiṁcit prayacchati |
SA07n2986:130: (57) adattaṁ vittam ādāya dānāni ca dadāti yaḥ |
SA07n2986:131: sa pretya dravyavān bhūtvā bhūyo bhavati nirdhanaḥ ||
SA07n2986:132: (58) yo na hartā na dātā ca na cātikṛpaṇo naraḥ |
SA07n2986:133: kṛcchreṇa mahatā dravyaṁ sthiraṁ sa labhate dhruvam ||
SA07n2986:134: (59) yo na hartā parasvānāṁ tyāgavān vītamatsaraḥ |
SA07n2986:135: ahāryaṁ vipulaṁ vittam iṣṭaṁ sa labhate naraḥ ||
SA07n2986:137: sukhī ca sa bhaven nityaṁ yo dadātīha bhojanam ||
SA07n2986:138: (61) salajjo rūpavān bhogī succhāyaḥ prāṇināṁ priyaḥ |
SA07n2986:139: sa bhaved vastralābhī ca yo vastrāṇi prayacchati ||
SA07n2986:141: prāsādāḥ sarvakāmāś ca jāyante tasya dehinaḥ ||
SA07n2986:143: bhavanti sukhino nityaṁ yānāni ca labhanti te ||
SA07n2986:147: sadā samṛddhaḥ sa bhaved ārāmaṁ yaḥ prayacchati ||
SA07n2986:150: (66) dīpadānena cakṣuṣmān vādyadānena susvaraḥ śayanāsanadānena sukhī bhavati mānavaḥ ||
SA07n2986:152: balavān varṇavān bhogī dīrghāyuḥ sa bhaven naraḥ ||
SA07n2986:155: (69) pattraṁ puṣpaṁ phalaṁ toyam abhayaṁ vacanaṁ priyam |
SA07n2986:156: yad yad evepsitaṁ bhaktyā dātavyaṁ tat tad arthinaḥ ||
SA07n2986:157: (70) kleśayitvā dadātīha svargārthaṁ vā bhayena vā |
SA07n2986:158: yaśaḥsaukhyābhilāṣād vā kliṣṭaṁ sa labhate phalam ||
SA07n2986:160: parārthaṁ yo dadātīha so 'kliṣṭaṁ phalam aśnute ||
SA07n2986:162: tena tena prakāreṇa tat sarvam upatiṣṭhate ||
SA07n2986:166: dānaṁ hi sarvasaukhyānām ananyat kāraṇaṁ matam ||
SA07n2986:168: svebhyo 'py adeśakālau ca varjayan puṁstvam ṛcchati ||
SA07n2986:169: (75) paradāreṣu saṁsaktaṁ cittaṁ yo na niyacchati |
SA07n2986:170: anaṅgeṣu ca rajyeta sa pumān strītvam ṛcchati ||
SA07n2986:171: (76) strītvaṁ jugupsate yā tu suśilā mandarāgiṇī |
SA07n2986:172: puṁstvam ākāṅkṣate nityaṁ sā nārī naratāṁ vrajet ||
SA07n2986:173: yas tu samyaṅ nirātaṅkaṁ brahmacaryaṁ niṣevate |
SA07n2986:174: tejasvī sadguṇaḥ śrīmān devair api sa pūjyate ||
SA07n2986:177: (78) bhinnānām api sattvānāṁ bhedaṁ naiva karoti yaḥ |
SA07n2986:179: (79) yas tv ājñāṁ kurute nityaṁ gurūṇāṁ hṛṣṭamānasaḥ |
SA07n2986:180: hitāhitābhidhāyī ca sa syād ādeyavāṅ naraḥ ||
SA07n2986:182: bhavanti sukhinaḥ saukhyaṁ duḥkhaṁ dattvā ca duḥkhinaḥ ||
SA07n2986:187: (83) duḥkhaṁ pāpasya puṇyasya sukhaṁ miśrasya miśritam |
SA07n2986:191: kalipriyaḥ pradātā ca sa bhaved asureśvaraḥ ||
SA07n2986:193: (85) nātmanā yaḥ sukhākāṅkṣī na ca hṛṣyet parigrahaiḥ |
SA07n2986:196: hṛṣyate yo na kalahais tridaśeṣu sa jāyate ||
SA07n2986:197: (87) na vigrahe ratā naiva kalahe hṛṣṭamānasāḥ |
SA07n2986:198: ekāntakuśalodyuktā ye ca yāmopagās tu te ||
SA07n2986:200: guṇair ye parihṛṣṇāś ca narās te tuṣitopagāḥ ||
SA07n2986:204: guṇādhikāś ca ye yānti paranirmitatāṁ dhruvam ||
SA07n2986:205: (90) śīlena svargam āpnoti dhyānena ca viśeṣataḥ |
SA07n2986:207: (91) śubhāśubhaphalaṁ karma yad etat kathitaṁ sphuṭam |
SA07n2986:208: śubhena labhyate saukhyaṁ duḥkhaṁ tv aśubhasaṁbhavam ||
SA07n2986:209: (92) mṛtyur vyādhir jarā caiva cintanīyam idaṁ trayam |
SA07n2986:210: viprayogaḥ priyaiḥ sārdhaṁ karmaṇāṁ ca svakaṁ phalam ||
SA07n2986:211: (93) evaṁ virāgam āpnoti viraktaḥ puṇyam ṛcchati |
SA07n2986:212: pāpaṁ ca varjayaty evaṁ tac ca saṁkṣepataḥ śṛṇu ||
SA07n2986:214: puṇyaṁ viparyayāt pāpam uktam etad mahātmanā ||
SA07n2986:216: (95) āryasaddharmasmṛtyupasathāna- mahāyānasūtrāntāt samākṛṣṭā mahāpaṇḍitāśvaghoṣena ṣaḍgatikārikāḥ samāptāḥ || (96)
